title: Awesome show
review: The plot is excellent, the chemistry is palpable, the acting superb, and the dialogue is amazing. I'm so glad I finally watched this classic. It didn't disappoint, and even had some surprising plot twists.

title: Two movies, one great, one sad
review: I loved the first half and was very frustrated with the second half. It ends up being more of a tragedy than I would have guessed, and all due to the stupid mistakes of the characters. A classic, but I wish I'd only watched the first half.

title: Unfortunately Disappointed
review: I wanted to like it, but the acting was too stiff, the plot way too predictable, and it fed off of a lot of shallow sterotypes. I'll admit, I couldn't finish it. I'm sure I'm in the minority, but that's fine. I was bored and disappointed.
